text:
# Configure advanced settings

Through the **Advanced settings** page, you can configure the following
settings:

• Date and time format to apply to the system globally

• Display language and time zone for the email notifications

MaivenPoint has supported **English (United States)** , **English (United
Kingdom)** , **Japanese** , **German** , **Dutch** , and **Chinese**. The
MaivenPoint system (including the MaivenPoint Online Services interface and
the interface of each product) will be displayed in the first preferred
language of the browser that you are using to access the system. The display
language of the Examena app (including the app installer and interface)
depends on the language of your operating system.

For details, refer to the table below:

**Components******|  **Identifier******|  **Option******|  **Display in******  
---|---|---|---  
Web portal |  First preferred language |  Japanese |  Japanese  
German |  German  
German (Austria)  
German (Germany)  
German (Liechtenstein)  
German (Switzerland)  
Dutch |  Dutch  
Dutch (Belgium)  
Chinese |  Chinese  
Chinese (Hong Kong SAR)  
Chinese (Simplified)  
Chinese (Traditional)  
English (Australia) |  English (United Kingdom)  
English (Canada)  
English (India)  
English (New Zealand)  
English (South Africa)  
English (United Kingdom, Oxford English Dictionary spelling)  
English (United Kingdom)  
All the other cases |  English (United States)  
Examena app |  Language of operating system |  Japanese |  Japanese  
German |  German  
Dutch (Belgium) |  Dutch  
Dutch (Netherlands)  
Chinese (Simplified, China) |  Chinese  
Chinese (Traditional, Hong Kong SAR)  
Chinese (Traditional, Taiwan)  
English (Australia) |  English (United Kingdom)  
English (Canada)  
English (India)  
English (New Zealand)  
English (South Africa)  
English (Singapore)  
English (United Kingdom)  
All the other cases |  English (United States)
